name: Project 1 (dominator2486)
description:
Feature 1: Display mouse position

  • Input: Mouse location
  • Output: text in upper left shows the X & Y of the mouse

Feature 2: Spawn Prefab

  • Input: mouse left click(once) or mouse right click(10 per second held)
  • Output: spawns one object per left click, and spawns 10 per second when right click is held down

Feature 3: Change Distance / toggle auto move

  • Input: Slider (Distance) / toggle box (disable auto move)
  • Output: spawns objects at the set distance for the object / spawns the object between 5-55 rotating through the range with each click

Feature 4: Change Rotation Delta

  • Input: Slider (Rotation Delta)
  • Output: changes the rotation of each object spawned by the set value in the slider

Feature 5: Change Decay time of objects / Toggle decay

  • Input: Slider (Time of Decay) / Toggle box(decay toggle)
  • Output: objects decay by the set value in seconds
